parameters.name: BandwidthType
parameters.description:
The bandwidth type of the GA instance. Valid values:

*   **Sharing**
*   **Exclusive** (default)

parameters.name: GlobalAccelerationInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: IncludeReservationData
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return information about pending orders. Valid values:

*   **false** (default)
*   **true**

parameters.name: IpAddress
parameters.description: The public IP address of the GA instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the GA instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the GA instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The ID of the backend service instance.

parameters.name: ServiceLocation
parameters.description:
The region of the backend service. Valid values:

*   **china-mainland**
*   **north-america**
*   **asia-pacific**
*   **europe**

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the GA instance. Valid values:

*   **Available**
*   **Inuse**
*   **Associating**
*   **Unassociating**
